DrugName: Pain Management with Morphine or Fentanyl (due to MCC)
Antibiotics (e.g., Ceftriaxone) for potential skin infection from Right flank subcutaneous tissue injury
Steroids (e.g., Methylprednisolone) for pulmonary contusion management
Fluid Resuscitation with Crystalloids (e.g., Normal Saline) to maintain VS and prevent shock
Blood Transfusion if necessary due to blood loss from Right hip/thigh laceration/abrasion
Wound Care with Topical antibiotics ointments
